skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quran soul radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Quran for the Soul Radio" is a dedicated station offering uninterrupted Quranic recitations by some of the world's most renowned and revered reciters. Immerse yourself in the beautiful and spiritually uplifting voices of iconic reciters such as Abdulbasseet, Minshawi, Albana, At-Tablawi, Al Husary, Al Shuraim, and Islam Sobhi, among many others. The station provides a serene listening experience, bringing the profound meanings of the Quran closer to the hearts of listeners while fostering a deep sense of peace and reflection. Perfect for those seeking spiritual connection through the pure recitation of the Holy Quran. The skill content is in Arabic
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
